title: Global pork exports 2020 , by country
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons of Country China is 39.0% smaller than the maximum value at EU.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country EU and lowest at Country China.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons of Country China is 39.0% smaller than the maximum value at EU.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in thousand metric tons for 7 number of Countrys.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
Country United States has the second highest value for Export volume in thousand metric tons.
Country EU has 39.0 times more Export volume in thousand metric tons than Country China which is has the lowest.
Export volume in thousand metric tons at Country EU is 3900.0 , second place is United States at 3221.0, and thirdly is Canada at 1400.0.
The Country China tends to be 2.64 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 10347.0.
